text: DYDY-TV, channel 2, is a television station of Philippine-government owned television network People's Television Network. Its transmitter is located at Brgy. San Miguel, Jordan, Guimaras. ==Digital television== UHF Channel 23 (527.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Note 4.01 480i 16:9 PTV SD1 PTV Iloilo Test Broadcast 4.02 480i PTV SD2 Blacksreen Test Broadcast 4.03 480i PTV SD3 Blacksreen Test Broadcast 4.04 240p 4:3 PTV 1seg PTV 1seg == Areas of coverage == === Primary areas === * Iloilo * Guimaras ===Secondary areas === * Bacolod * Portion of Negros Occidental ==Related pages== *People's Television Network *List of People's Television Network stations and channels *DWGT-TV - the network's flagship station in Manila. ==References== Category:1972 establishments in Asia Category:Filipino television stations
title: DYDY-TV
